document_data.name: Moorhound
document_data.organized play: ''[[Dragon's Knowledge]]'';''[[The Good, the Undead, and the Ugly]]''
document_data.Description: On average, this breed's back was up to the height of a [[human]] man's waist and their bodies were {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} long.

Ecology.Habitats: In the years following [[1385 DR]], packs of wild moorhounds became prevalent across [[Corwell]], the pastoral heartland of [[Gwynneth]] Isle.{{Cite dragon/376/Realmslore: Sarifal|64}}

document_data.Notable moorhounds:
*[[Angus]]
* [[Canthus]], a moorhound belonging to [[Tristan Kendrick]].
* [[Warlock (moorhound)|Warlock]], a moorhound belonging to [[Angus Blackstone]].
